INSERT INTO student (UserId, Name, StudentNumber, Gender, PhoneNumber, Email, Year, AcademyDictionary, MajorDictionary, PoliticalStatusDictionary, StudentTypeDictionary) VALUES (#{UserId}, #{Name},#{StudentNumber},#{Gender},#{PhoneNumber}, #{Email},#{Year}, #{AcademyDictionary}, #{MajorDictionary}, #{PoliticalStatusDictionary},#{StudentTypeDictionary})
SELECT id ,UserId, Name, StudentNumber, Gender, PhoneNumber, Email, Year, AcademyDictionary, MajorDictionary, PoliticalStatusDictionary, StudentTypeDictionary FROM student WHERE UserId=#{UserId}
SELECT id ,UserId, Name, StudentNumber, Gender, PhoneNumber, Email, Year, AcademyDictionary, MajorDictionary, PoliticalStatusDictionary, StudentTypeDictionary FROM student WHERE id=#{studentId}

INSERT INTO GradeSummary ( StudentId, SocialPracticeGrade, ResearchGrade, VolunteerServiceGrade, AcademicGrade, StudentLeadershipGrade, PersonalSummaryGrade, SumGrade) VALUES ( #{studentId}, #{socialPracticeGrade}, #{researchGrade}, #{volunteerServiceGrade}, #{academicGrade}, #{studentLeadershipGrade}, #{personalSummaryGrade}, #{sumGrade})
